title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a simple API client for JSONPlaceholder that:
- Gets all posts for a specific user
- Filters posts by keyword in title
- Returns formatted results
Implement error handling and use type hints.
instructions:

hints.text: Use requests.get with params={'userId': user_id}. Filter with list comprehension checking if keyword in post['title']. Format with f-string.
